channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- U.Motion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- U.Motion

item.title: CVE-2018-7773|2024-09-16T17:18:04.772Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: The vulnerability exists within processing of nfcserver.php in Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4. The underlying SQLite database query is subject to SQL injection on the sessionid input parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-7769|2024-09-16T17:58:21.297Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: The vulnerability exists within processing of xmlserver.php in Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4. The underlying SQLite database query is subject to SQL injection on the id input parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-9960|2024-09-16T17:32:51.192Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's U.motion Builder software versions 1.2.1 and prior in which the system response to error provides more information than should be available to an unauthenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2017-7973|2024-09-16T16:13:23.912Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's U.motion Builder software versions 1.2.1 and prior in which an unauthenticated user can use calls to various paths allowing performance of arbitrary SQL commands against the underlying database.
